Comment: This is such a bizarre story. This student's visa was revoked (under the Biden administration!!) for no reason whatsoever, now the student is being detained for an indefinite period of time for no reason whatsoever.  >A Louisiana judge who denied Doroudi bond in mid-April said he didn’t sufficiently prove that he wasn’t a national security threat, Doroudi’s lawyer, David Rozas said. Rozas said he was “flabbergasted” because the government hasn’t presented evidence that Doroudi is a threat, though that is what the Department of Homeland Security has alleged.  Where did anyone ever get the impression that he's a national security threat??  Nothing about this story makes any sense.
